message: I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000.
Thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I believe we can reach a more reasonable price. I would like to propose a price of $1200000 for the product.
I understand that you think the product is worth $1200000, but I believe it's worth more. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1350000.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I still believe we can find a more suitable price for both of us. My counteroffer is $1250000 for the product.
I'm getting closer to your price, but I still think the product is worth more. I'm willing to compromise, so I'm counteroffering at $1300000.
Thank you for your continued negotiation. I am willing to consider your latest offer, but I still believe there might be room for further discussion. My counteroffer is $1275000 for the product.
I think we're getting close, but I'm not quite ready to meet your price yet. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering at $1290000.
I appreciate your efforts in negotiation, but I'm still unable to agree to your latest offer. My final counteroffer is $1280000 for the product.
